description: A set of service endpoints used by the viewer

fullscreen.description: Indicates viewer takes up entire viewport
fullscreen.title: [en]

logoUrl.description: An optional image to be used in the place of the default viewer logo
logoUrl.title: [en]

logo.description: Indicates if the logo should be shown in the left side menu.
logo.title: [en]

sideMenu.description: Specifies which options are available in the left side menu.
sideMenu.title: [en]

restrictNavigation.description: Will restrict the user from panning beyond the maximum extent.
restrictNavigation.title: [en]

about.description: About properties from configuration file or Markdown folder
about.title: [en]

folderName.description: Help folder name who contain the help description and images
folderName.title: [en]

reorderable.description: Specifies if the items in the legend can be reordered; structured legend ignores this property.
reorderable.title: [en]

allowImport.description: Specifies if the user-added layers are allowed.
allowImport.title: [en]

isOpen.description: Specifies whether the legend is opened by default on initial loading of the map for small, medium, and large viewports

large.description: Whether the legend is opened by default on initial loading of the map for large viewports
large.title: [en]

medium.description: Whether the legend is opened by default on initial loading of the map for medium viewports
medium.title: [en]

small.description: Whether the legend is opened by default on initial loading of the map for small viewports
small.title: [en]

isOpen.title: [en]

tableIsOpen.description: Specifies whether the table panel is opened by default on initial loading of the map for small, medium, and large viewports

id.description: The id of the layer for referencing within the viewer
id.title: [en]

large.description: Whether the table panel is opened by default on initial loading of the map for large viewports
large.title: [en]

medium.description: Whether the table panel is opened by default on initial loading of the map for medium viewports
medium.title: [en]

small.description: Whether the table panel is opened by default on initial loading of the map for small viewports
small.title: [en]

tableIsOpen.title: [en]

title: ui.title
